system.description: The character shoots at every target that moves through their kill zone.
system.trigger: An enemy in the character's line of sight starts to move.
system.effect: The character makes a ranged attack on the enemy. If the attack is a success, the enemy takes normal damage. On a Fantastic success, the enemy takes double damage. Either way, the character regains their reaction. Each target can be affected by this attack by this character only once per round.
